      • getEmulatedDelay

        public static long getEmulatedDelay(org.json.JSONObject jsonData)
        Receiver calls this method to toString delay that is to be emulated, and delays processing the packet by that amount. We put the delay to be emulated inside the json at the sender side because the receiver side does not know which node ID sent the packet, and hence cannot know how much to delay the packet
        Parameters:
        jsonData -
        Returns:
        The value of the emulated delay.

      • getEmulatedDelay

        public static long getEmulatedDelay(java.lang.String strData)
        Parameters:
        strData -
        Returns:
        Value of emulated delay.
